params._dataHash: Hash of data being attested and nonce
params._requestNonce: Nonce in sig signed by subject and requester so they can't be replayed
params._requester: User requesting and paying for this attestation in BLT
params._requesterSig: Signature authorizing payment from requester to attester
params._reward: Payment to attester from requester in BLT
params._subjectSig: Signed authorization from subject with attestation agreement

params._requestNonce: Nonce in sig signed by subject and requester so they can't be replayed
params._requester: user requesting this attestation be completed and paying for it in BLT

params._reward: payment to attester from requester in BLT wei

params._tokenEscrowMarketplace: Address of marketplace holding tokens which are released to attesters upon completion of a job

devdoc.title: AttestationLogic allows users to submit attestations given valid signatures

attest(address,address,uint256,bytes,byt.notice: Function for attester to submit attestation from their own account)

attestFor(address,address,address,uint25.notice: Submit attestation for a user in order to pay the gas costs

methods.constructor: AttestationLogic constructor sets the implementation address of all related contracts

contest(address,uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Function for attester to reject an attestation and receive payment  without associating the negative attestation with the subject's bloomId

migrateAttestation(address,address,addre.notice: Submit attestation completed prior to deployment of this contract

userdoc.notice: Attestation Logic Logic provides a public interface for Bloom and users to submit attestations.
